definition: chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: I have kept a reserve fund in case of accidents.
sentences.chinese: 我已筹备了一笔准备基金以防不测。

sentences.english: Well no, because we’re doing it.
sentences.chinese: 哦不，因为我们正在筹备。
二代是否已经在筹备中？

sentences.english: It’s easy to get caught up in the mile-long to-do list of preparations.
sentences.chinese: 你很容易被冗长的筹备清单搞得焦头烂额。

sentences.english: Jackie was in Shunde, China last week helping raise money for Shunde charities.
sentences.chinese: 上周大哥在中国顺德帮助顺德的慈善团体筹备善款。

sentences.english: He says she even volunteered to help prepare for the school festival.
sentences.chinese: 他说她甚至自愿帮忙筹备校庆活动。

sentences.english: A memorial service is planned at Pomona College.
sentences.chinese: 坡摩那学院正在筹备一场纪念哀悼会。

sentences.english: Revoc of the shuttle business licenses or the licenses for advertising oper.
sentences.chinese: 撤消生意执照恐怕广告筹备答应证。

sentences.english: Pick up your Host Organizing Committee gift bag with the voucher in your registration packet.
sentences.chinese: 领取你的地主筹备委员会礼品袋连同你注册袋之收据。

sentences.english: For the funeral arrangement, I need flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我需要买一些花来筹备一个葬礼。

sentences.english: Preparatory meetings have made considerable progress in reaching agreement on some of the key issues.
sentences.chinese: 在筹备会议中，我们已就一些关键项目，取得共识。

sentences.english: 10 years later, he started preparing for that remake of the classic TV series .
sentences.chinese: 10年后，他开始筹备重拍那部经典的电视连续剧。

sentences.english: Performance schedule will be arranged by SCTA committee.
sentences.chinese: 表演程序表由大会筹备委员会安排。

sentences.english: Preparatory Assistance for the Establishment of an Oceangraphic Instate Phase I .
sentences.chinese: 建立海洋学院第一阶段的筹备性援助。

sentences.english: I’m trying to buy flowers for a funeral arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 我需要买一些花来筹备一个葬礼。

sentences.english: The Institute Organizing Committee reserves the right to assign hotels based on a first-come-first-served basis.
sentences.chinese: 研习会筹备委员会保有权利，对先到先服务之原则。

definition: to prepare to film/to plan a shoot
to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
to come to a decision/to fix on (a date etc)/to determine/to finalize/to nail down (a deal etc)
to begin shooting (a movie, a scene of a movie etc)/to start the bidding (auction)/to start a trading session (stock market)
to boost support or interest/to campaign/to promote
